about.description:
[![Build Status](https://github.com/mamba-org/mamba/workflows/CI/badge.svg)](https://github.com/mamba-org/mamba/actions)
[![Join the Gitter Chat](https://badges.gitter.im/Join%20Chat.svg)](https://gitter.im/mamba-org/Lobby?utm_source=badge&utm_medium=badge&utm_campaign=pr-badge&utm_content=badge)
[![docs](https://readthedocs.org/projects/mamba/badge/?version=latest&style=flat)](https://mamba.readthedocs.io/en/latest)

`mamba` is a reimplementation of the conda package manager in C++.

- parallel downloading of repository data and package files using multi-threading
- libsolv for much faster dependency solving, a state of the art library used in the RPM package manager of Red Hat, Fedora and OpenSUSE
- core parts of `mamba` are implemented in C++ for maximum efficiency

At the same time, `mamba` utilizes the same command line parser, package installation and deinstallation code and transaction verification routines as `conda` to stay as compatible as possible.

Mamba is part of a bigger ecosystem to make scientific packaging more sustainable. You can read our [announcement blog post](https://medium.com/@QuantStack/open-software-packaging-for-science-61cecee7fc23).
The ecosystem also consists of `quetz`, an open source `conda` package server and `boa`, a fast `conda` package builder.


Please refer to the [`mamba` and `micromamba` installation guide](https://mamba.readthedocs.io/en/latest/installation.html) in the documentation.


`mamba` and `micromamba` come with features on top of stock `conda`.


To efficiently query repositories and query package dependencies you can use `mamba repoquery` or `micromamba repoquery`.
See the [repoquery documentation](https://mamba.readthedocs.io/en/latest/user_guide/mamba.html#repoquery) for details.


`micromamba` can be used to install lock files generated by [conda-lock](https://conda-incubator.github.io/conda-lock/) without having to install `conda-lock`. Simply invoke e.g. `micromamba create -n my-env -f conda-lock.yml` with an environment lockfile named `*-lock.yml` or `*-lock.yaml`.
about.summary: A fast drop-in alternative to conda, using libsolv for dependency resolution

name: libmamba
raw_recipe:
# This file created by conda-build 3.25.0
# ------------------------------------------------

package:
  name: libmamba
  version: 1.4.6
source:
  sha256: ee24b6b6ed61757f3dffc6ff14f0357a5d2c71968f9f8ca5b3baee6a9ab8b95b
  url: https://github.com/mamba-org/mamba/archive/refs/tags/2023.06.30.tar.gz
build:
  ignore_run_exports:
    - spdlog
  number: 0
  run_exports:
    - libmamba >=1.4.6,<1.5.0a0
  string: h0c45e31_0
requirements:
  build:
    - _libgcc_mutex 0.1 conda_forge
    - _openmp_mutex 4.5 2_gnu
    - _sysroot_linux-aarch64_curr_repodata_hack 4 h57d6b7b_13
    - binutils_impl_linux-64 2.40 hf600244_0
    - binutils_impl_linux-aarch64 2.40 h40ea8b1_0
    - binutils_linux-aarch64 2.40 h19b5abf_0
    - bzip2 1.0.8 h7f98852_4
    - c-ares 1.19.1 hd590300_0
    - ca-certificates 2023.5.7 hbcca054_0
    - cmake 3.26.4 hcfe8598_0
    - expat 2.5.0 hcb278e6_1
    - gcc_impl_linux-64 12.3.0 he2b93b0_0
    - gcc_impl_linux-aarch64 12.3.0 hfb0b921_0
    - gcc_linux-aarch64 12.3.0 hd570763_0
    - gxx_impl_linux-64 12.3.0 he2b93b0_0
    - gxx_impl_linux-aarch64 12.3.0 hfb0b921_0
    - gxx_linux-aarch64 12.3.0 h4913bc6_0
    - kernel-headers_linux-64 2.6.32 he073ed8_15
    - kernel-headers_linux-aarch64 4.18.0 h5b4a56d_13
    - keyutils 1.6.1 h166bdaf_0
    - krb5 1.20.1 h81ceb04_0
    - ld_impl_linux-64 2.40 h41732ed_0
    - ld_impl_linux-aarch64 2.40 hc365e21_0
    - libcurl 8.1.2 h409715c_0
    - libedit 3.1.20191231 he28a2e2_2
    - libev 4.33 h516909a_1
    - libexpat 2.5.0 hcb278e6_1
    - libgcc-devel_linux-64 12.3.0 h8bca6fd_0
    - libgcc-devel_linux-aarch64 12.3.0 h1a07b91_0
    - libgcc-ng 13.1.0 he5830b7_0
    - libgomp 13.1.0 he5830b7_0
    - libnghttp2 1.52.0 h61bc06f_0
    - libsanitizer 12.3.0 h0f45ef3_0
    - libssh2 1.11.0 h0841786_0
    - libstdcxx-devel_linux-64 12.3.0 h8bca6fd_0
    - libstdcxx-devel_linux-aarch64 12.3.0 h1a07b91_0
    - libstdcxx-ng 13.1.0 hfd8a6a1_0
    - libuv 1.44.2 h166bdaf_0
    - libzlib 1.2.13 hd590300_5
    - ncurses 6.4 hcb278e6_0
    - ninja 1.11.1 h924138e_0
    - openssl 3.1.1 hd590300_1
    - rhash 1.4.3 h166bdaf_0
    - sysroot_linux-64 2.12 he073ed8_15
    - sysroot_linux-aarch64 2.17 h5b4a56d_13
    - xz 5.2.6 h166bdaf_0
    - zlib 1.2.13 hd590300_5
    - zstd 1.5.2 h3eb15da_6
  host:
    - _openmp_mutex 4.5 2_gnu
    - bzip2 1.0.8 hf897c2e_4
    - c-ares 1.19.1 h31becfc_0
    - ca-certificates 2023.5.7 hcefe29a_0
    - cli11 2.3.2 hd600fc2_0
    - cpp-expected 1.1.0 h4c384f3_0
    - fmt 9.1.0 hdd96247_0
    - icu 72.1 hcf00150_0
    - keyutils 1.6.1 h4e544f5_0
    - krb5 1.20.1 h113d92e_0
    - libarchive 3.6.2 h566b526_1
    - libcurl 8.1.2 hc34909b_0
    - libedit 3.1.20191231 he28a2e2_2
    - libev 4.33 h516909a_1
    - libgcc-ng 13.1.0 h2b4548d_0
    - libgomp 13.1.0 h2b4548d_0
    - libiconv 1.17 h9cdd2b7_0
    - libnghttp2 1.52.0 h250e5c5_0
    - libsolv 0.7.24 hd84c7bf_1
    - libssh2 1.11.0 h492db2e_0
    - libstdcxx-ng 13.1.0 h452befe_0
    - libxml2 2.11.4 h164fba4_0
    - libzlib 1.2.13 h31becfc_5
    - lz4-c 1.9.4 hd600fc2_0
    - lzo 2.10 h516909a_1000
    - ncurses 6.4 h2e1726e_0
    - nlohmann_json 3.11.2 h4de3ea5_0
    - openssl 3.1.1 h31becfc_1
    - reproc 14.2.4 hb4cce97_0
    - reproc-cpp 14.2.4 hd600fc2_0
    - spdlog 1.11.0 hf0e50c9_1
    - xz 5.2.6 h9cdd2b7_0
    - yaml-cpp 0.7.0 h4de3ea5_2
    - zstd 1.5.2 h44f6412_6
  run:
    - fmt >=9.1.0,<10.0a0
    - libarchive >=3.6.2,<3.7.0a0
    - libcurl >=8.1.2,<9.0a0
    - libgcc-ng >=12
    - libsolv >=0.7.24,<0.8.0a0
    - libstdcxx-ng >=12
    - openssl >=3.1.1,<4.0a0
    - reproc-cpp >=14.2,<15.0a0
    - yaml-cpp >=0.7.0,<0.8.0a0
test:
  commands:
    - test -d ${PREFIX}/include/mamba
    - test -f ${PREFIX}/include/mamba/version.hpp
    - test -f ${PREFIX}/lib/cmake/libmamba/libmambaConfig.cmake
    - test -f ${PREFIX}/lib/cmake/libmamba/libmambaConfigVersion.cmake
    - test -e ${PREFIX}/lib/libmamba${SHLIB_EXT}
    - cat $PREFIX/include/mamba/version.hpp | grep "LIBMAMBA_VERSION_MAJOR 1"
    - cat $PREFIX/include/mamba/version.hpp | grep "LIBMAMBA_VERSION_MINOR 4"
    - cat $PREFIX/include/mamba/version.hpp | grep "LIBMAMBA_VERSION_PATCH 6"

  dev_url: https://github.com/mamba-org/mamba
  home: https://github.com/mamba-org/mamba
  license: BSD-3-Clause

  summary: A fast drop-in alternative to conda, using libsolv for dependency resolution
extra:

  final: true
  recipe-maintainers:
